name: 恶魔总是追捕你
description: Demons always haunt you. Inked using japanese Pentel Color Brush Black, Pentel Color Brush Red and Sakura Koi Watercolors on paper Canson Aquarelle A4 (21x29,7cm) 300g/m2. This piece is both digital and physical as I will send the original art piece to the buyer together with a certificate issued by the Chilean National Museum of Fine Arts. Final note: This art piece will be shipped worldwide and the shipping cost is included in its price.
